entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
